DOC.brief_summary: The purpose 2016/17 pilot study improve combination card-based adverse drug reaction ( ADR ) system use routine data collect adverse event follow vaccination seasonal influenza vaccine , per European Medicines Agency ( EMA ) guidance Pharmacovigilance Risk Assessment Committee EMA ( PRAC ) requirement , identify additional data may need collect order appropriately address requirement .
